com.whaleal.mars.core.aggregation.expressions

类 MathExpressions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whaleal.mars.core.aggregation.expressions.MathExpressions

  • public final class MathExpressions
extends Object
    Defines helper methods for the math expressions

    • 方法详细资料

      • abs

        public static Expression abs(Expression value)
        Returns the absolute value of a number.
        参数:
        value - the value
        返回:
        the new expression $abs

      • add

        public static MathExpression add(Expression first,
                                 Expression... additional)
        Adds numbers together or adds numbers and a date. If one of the arguments is a date, $add treats the other arguments as milliseconds to add to the date.
        参数:
        first - the first expression to sum
        additional - any subsequent expressions to include in the sum
        返回:
        the new expression $add

      • ceil

        public static Expression ceil(Expression value)
        Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to the specified number.
        参数:
        value - the value
        返回:
        the new expression $ceil

      • divide

        public static Expression divide(Expression numerator,
                                Expression divisor)
        Returns the result of dividing the first number by the second. Accepts two argument expressions.
        参数:
        numerator - the numerator
        divisor - the divisor
        返回:
        the new expression $divide

      • exp

        public static Expression exp(Expression value)
        Raises e to the specified exponent.
        参数:
        value - the value
        返回:
        the new expression $exp

      • floor

        public static Expression floor(Expression value)
        Returns the largest integer less than or equal to the specified number.
        参数:
        value - the value
        返回:
        the new expression $floor

      • ln

        public static Expression ln(Expression value)
        Calculates the natural log of a number.
        参数:
        value - the value
        返回:
        the new expression $ln

      • log

        public static Expression log(Expression number,
                             Expression base)
        Calculates the log of a number in the specified base.
        参数:
        number - the number to log
        base - the base to use
        返回:
        the new expression $log

      • log10

        public static Expression log10(Expression value)
        Calculates the log base 10 of a number.
        参数:
        value - the value
        返回:
        the new expression $log10

      • mod

        public static Expression mod(Expression dividend,
                             Expression divisor)
        Returns the remainder of the first number divided by the second. Accepts two argument expressions.
        参数:
        dividend - the dividend
        divisor - the divisor
        返回:
        the new expression $mod

      • multiply

        public static Expression multiply(Expression first,
                                  Expression... additional)
        Multiplies numbers together and returns the result. Pass the arguments to $multiply in an array.
        参数:
        first - the first expression to add
        additional - any additional expressions
        返回:
        the new expression $multiply

      • pow

        public static Expression pow(Expression number,
                             Expression exponent)
        Raises a number to the specified exponent.
        参数:
        number - the base name
        exponent - the exponent
        返回:
        the new expression $pow

      • round

        public static Expression round(Expression number,
                               Expression place)
        Rounds a number to to a whole integer or to a specified decimal place.
        参数:
        number - the value
        place - the place to round to
        返回:
        the new expression $round

      • sqrt

        public static Expression sqrt(Expression value)
        Calculates the square root.
        参数:
        value - the value
        返回:
        the new expression $sqrt

      • subtract

        public static Expression subtract(Expression minuend,
                                  Expression subtrahend)
        Returns the result of subtracting the second value from the first. If the two values are numbers, return the difference. If the two values are dates, return the difference in milliseconds. If the two values are a date and a number in milliseconds, return the resulting date. Accepts two argument expressions. If the two values are a date and a number, specify the date argument first as it is not meaningful to subtract a date from a number.
        参数:
        minuend - the number to subtract from
        subtrahend - the number to subtract
        返回:
        the new expression $subtract

      • trunc

        public static Expression trunc(Expression number,
                               Expression place)
        Truncates a number to a whole integer or to a specified decimal place.

        NOTE: Prior to 4.2, the place value wasn't available. Pass null if your server is older than 4.2.

        参数:
        number - the value
        place - the place to trunc to
        返回:
        the new expression $trunc
